thread.title: Live updates from Les Miles' Monday press conference previewing South Carolina, 12:30 p.m.
thread.title_full: Live updates from Les Miles' Monday press conference previewing South Carolina, 12:30 p.m. | NOLA.com

author: Jim Kleinpeter, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Live updates from Les Miles' Monday press conference previewing South Carolina, 12:30 p.m.
text:
LSU coach Les Miles will be at the podium at 12:30 p.m. Monday for his weekly press conference to preview the Tigers' visit to South Carolina for an 11 a.m. game. Join us for live updates in the comment stream below.
The Tigers moved up to No. 5 in the coaches poll and No. 7 in the Associated Press Top 25 after Saturday's victory against Eastern Michigan. LSU faces SEC East foes the next two weeks with South Carolina and then Florida at home on Oct. 17.
Heisman Trophy frontrunner Leonard Fournette, the nation's leading rusher, leads the Tigers against the 2-3 Gamecocks, who are coming off a 24-10 loss to Missouri.
Scroll down to the comment stream, punch in and follow along. Also, feel free to jump in with a question, comment or observation.
